description: I. Letter dated 17/06/2010 from Maria Miller MP to Richard Tilt, SSAC Chair, regarding welfare reform drugs recovery pilot scheme. 2 p. II. Explanatory Memorandum for the Social Security Advisory Committee: The Social Security (Welfare Reform Drugs Recovery Pilot Scheme) Regulations 2010. 42 p. III. Letter dated 19/05/2010 from Richard Tilt, SSAC Chair, to Iain Duncan Smith MP regarding welfare reform drugs recovery pilot scheme. 14 p.
